enhanced_by.reason: The streamParser method relies on the openStream method to open and prepare the input stream from the file.
The streamParser method uses the detectCharset method to determine the character set of the input stream, which is crucial for parsing.
Both streamParser and parseInputStream methods involve parsing input streams and producing a Document. The assertions for streamParser can be informed by the behavior and output of parseInputStream.
The load method also parses a file to a Document, and its assertions can provide insights into the expected behavior and output of the streamParser method.
